comments.body:
```suggestion
(*Interested in her story? See* `Wikipedia <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No%C3%ABl_Leslie,_Countess_of_Rothes>`__ *!*)
```

Is this needed for anything?

The backslash removes the space between the link and the exclamation mark.

Original:
(*Interested in her story? See* [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No%C3%ABl_Leslie,_Countess_of_Rothes)*!*)

Applying your suggestion:
(*Interested in her story? See* [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No%C3%ABl_Leslie,_Countess_of_Rothes) *!*)

diffHunk:

(*Interested in her story? See* `Wikipedia <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/No%C3%ABl_Leslie,_Countess_of_Rothes>`__\ *!*)
